title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Science and Technology in Agriculture
purpose: To provide a forum for parliamentarians and stakeholders to debate and highlight the value of science and technology in agriculture.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 0207 219 6502.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Daniel Pearsall, Front Foot Communications Ltd. Tel: 07770 875455
contact_details.secretariat: Front Foot Communications Ltd acts as the group's secretariat.http://www.frontfoot.uk.com/

detailed_benefits.Description: Front Foot Communications Ltd is paid by the following to act as the group's secretariat: British Society of Plant Breeders, National Farmers Union, National Institute of Agricultural Botany, CropLife UK, Agricultural Industries Confederation, Agricultural Biotechnology Council, UK Flour Millers, Maltsters Association of Great Britain From : 11/11/2024 To  : 10/11/2025
